humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive metaplastic carcinoma measures 7 cm in greatest dimension and directly invades the dermis with associated skin ulceration. Based on the rules provided, T4 tumors are of any size with direct extension to the chest wall or skin. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T4.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for this patient's cancer is T4b, which is indicated in the report by 'pT4b (skin ulceration)'. This is determined by the fact that the invasive carcinoma directly invades into the dermis with associated skin ulceration.
